list.name: Arga
list.quote: Since I started using dump trucks from THEI, site operations have become smoother. The equipment is more durable and fuel-efficient. The 24-hour service is also very fast, any issues are handled immediately. The aftersales bonus is great too, my office vehicle gets free service from TJM Auto Care. I'm really satisfied with THEI!

list.name: Shambat Kumar
list.quote: Our forklifts work nonstop for 10 hours every day, usually they wear out quickly, but the units from THEI are really tough. What makes it comfortable is THEI's technicians regularly follow up and always remind us about service, so we never miss it. First time buying a forklift, got free coating, wheel alignment, and office car maintenance too!

list.name: Rama
list.quote: I thought claiming warranty would be complicated when my crane had an error on site, but THEI's team came in just 4 hours and the service was completed without extra cost. The best part, I also got a TJM Auto Care membership bonus for my company car. Never found aftersales this serious before, really salute THEI.

list.name: Richard
list.quote: At first I only tried one unit, turns out the equipment is efficient and the service is fast. Whenever there's a problem, THEI's team comes right away. Now I added more units, work is more peaceful. The bonuses are plenty, even the operational car gets serviced. Amazing, never expected this kind of service in Indonesia.
